title: Server-side with Node.js
description: We are now in Module #2! In our previous module, we focused on client-side Javascript. We now will learn the basics of server-side programming with Node. We will begin building the Data Selfie App, a project tutorial by Joey K. Lee. This unit we will spend time getting setup with Node.js and our workflow.

timestamps.title: Explain! Server Side Programming and Node.js
What are we going to build?
Explain! What is NPM? What is package.json?
Explain! What does a server do?
